short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the official Chrome Extension for Accelo: accelo.com/chrome-extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accelo's Chrome extension allows developers to live and work in JIRA by improving the way links are tracked between Accelo and JIRA. Now, when developers create or edit a JIRA ticket, theyâ€™ll be able to quickly search for the client project, milestone, ticket, or contract that already lives in Accelo right from JIRA.
